summary.para: Gets the number of bitwise instructions.

param.name: pCount
param.para: Type: UINT*
A pointer to the number of bitwise instructions.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: Gets the number of conversion instructions used in a shader.

param.name: pCount
param.para: Type: UINT*
A pointer to a UINT that will contain the conversion instruction count when the method returns.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

param.name: pPrim
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to the input-primitive type (see ).

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: Gets the number of Movc instructions.

param.name: pCount
param.para: Type: UINT*
A pointer to the number of Movc instructions.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: Gets the number of Mov instructions.

param.name: pCount
param.para: Type: UINT*
A pointer to the number of Mov instructions.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: Gets a resource binding description by name.

param.name: Name
param.para: Type: LPCSTR*
A pointer to a string containing the variable name.

param.name: pDesc
param.para: Type: *
Pointer to a structure that will be populated with resource binding information.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

param.name: Name
param.para: Type: LPCSTR*
A pointer to a string containing the variable name.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: Indicates whether a shader was compiled in Direct3D 10 on Direct3D 9 mode.

param.name: pbLevel9Shader
param.para: Type: BOOL*
Pointer to a BOOL variable that will be set true if the shader was compiled in Direct3D 10 on Direct3D 9 mode; otherwise false.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: Indicates whether a pixel shader is intended to run a pixel frequency or sample frequency.

param.name: pbSampleFrequency
param.para: Type: BOOL*
A pointer to a BOOL variable that will be set to true if the shader is intended to run at sample frequency; false otherwise.

returns.para: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

remarks.para: This method requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.

summary.para: A shader-reflection interface accesses shader information.

remarks.para: This interface requires Windows Vista Service Pack 1.
